subject: Golf
Presidential Medal of Freedom
Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: Charlie Sifford, who in 1961 became the first African-American to join the PGA Tour, on Monday was awarded the nation’s highest civilian honor by President Obama.
snippet: Charlie Sifford, who in 1961 became the first African-American to join the PGA Tour, on Monday was awarded the nation’s highest civilian honor by President Obama.
